alert.note: Alert for Caledonia; Eastern Chittenden; Lamoille; Orleans; Washington (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 9:01PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Lamoille, west central Caledonia, southwestern Orleans, east central Chittenden and northern Washington Counties through 945 PM EDT... At 901 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Bolton, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Morrisville, Greensboro, Calais, Eden, Stannard, Stowe, Hardwick, Waterbury Village, Albany, Hyde Park, Wolcott, Greensboro Bend, Worcester, Morrisville Village, Woodbury, Wheelock, Waterbury, Albany Village, Craftsbury, and Morristown. This includes Interstate 89 between mile markers 63 and 67. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Caledonia; Eastern Chittenden; Lamoille; Orleans; Washington
